title: Global Streetscapes (MLY1)
description: Contains the metadata of each SVI originally provided by Mapillary. Split into five parts (metadata_mly1, metadata_mly2, metadata_mly3, metadata_mly4, metadata_mly5) to reduce file size.
creator: Yujun Hou
Matias Quintana
Maxim Khomiakov
Winston Yap
Jiani Ouyang
Koichi Ito
Zeyu Wang
Tianhong Zhao
Filip Biljecki
publisher: National University of Singapore Urban Analytics Lab
provider: Healthy Regions & Policies Lab, University of Illinois, Urbana-Champaign
data_variables: Unique image ID, Source (Mapillary or KartaView), Orginal ID (by Mapillary or KartaView), Captured at (timestamp), Camera parameters, Quality score, Altitude, Atomic scale, Exif orientation, Is panoramic, Organization ID
